Articles.Content:
I'm playing my first career and I already have multiple kerbals that have done multiple orbits around Kerbin, but all of then only shows 2 orbits when I hover over some kerbal assigned to me.

Does this bug happen to anyone else?

* I was playing with mods, but tested without any...

Thanks.
Those are not numbers of orbits, that is the amount of experience points they have received for that particular achievement.
